mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu_info (menu_code, menu_name, menu_lv, node_path, pare_menu_code, pare_menu, menu_order, menu_desc, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuLv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pareMenuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pareMenu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_menu_info set menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_lv = #{menuLv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, node_path = #{nodePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pare_menu_code = #{pareMenuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pare_menu = #{pareMenu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_order = #{menuOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_desc = #{menuDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where menu_code = #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select menu_code, menu_name, menu_lv, node_path, pare_menu_code, pare_menu, menu_order, menu_desc, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_menu_info where menu_code = #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select menu_code, menu_name, menu_lv, node_path, pare_menu_code, pare_menu, menu_order, menu_desc, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_menu_info
select * from sys_menu_info where rec_stat ='0' order by menu_lv ,menu_order desc

select * from sys_menu_info where 1=1
and menu_code = #{menuCode}
and menu_name like '%${menuName}%'
and menu_lv like '%${menuLv}%'
and pare_menu_code like '%${pareMenuCode}%'
and pare_menu like '%${pareMenu}%'
and menu_order like '%${menuOrder}%'
and menu_desc like '%${menuDesc}%'
and rec_stat like '%${recStat}%'
select * from sys_menu_info where 1=1 and pare_menu_code = #{pareMenuCode} order by menu_order desc
select * from sys_menu_info where 1=1 and rec_stat='0' and pare_menu_code = #{pareMenuCode} order by menu_order
